::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a brief introduction to R.

It covers install, setup and first steps. This is not a course to learn R coding, only to get started so you can use it for other courses as part of your QSPL learnings.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

-   Know what R is.
-   Install and set up R.
-   Be familiar with some basic R use.
-   Understand the ideas of packages and how to manage them.


:::

::: {.course-prerequisites}

:::



::: {.course-content}
# Course Content

The course covers these topics (and more):

- Introduction
- Install and Setup
- Basic Functionality 
- Installing and using Packages
- Further Resources
:::
